logentry.msg: fixes the problems of not being able to edit with one form editor and not being able to PUT documents via webDAV

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: DefaultSiteTree: call saveDocument(), this fixes the problem that sitetree nodes were not removed.

logentry.msg: DocumentSet: added some methods and invariant checks

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added the concept of Nodes to the site management. The dependency relation is now applied to nodes, which avoids confusion re. document language versions.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Applying patch for Bug #35660: UniqueDocumentId should not try to increase a dash-separated character value (foo-a), only number values (foo-1), credits to Simon Litwan

logentry.msg: Updated cocoon local build files to SVN revision 202297. It works with cocoon 2.1.7. Cocoon Querybean block is no longer included in lenya build.
